title: If Police Station is available within 1km
clause_text: If Police Station is available within 1km. area from the proposed Township, then such facility need not to be provided.
section: Public Utilities :- For Master Layout area up to & inclusive of 200 ha.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: If Police Station is available within 1km. area from the proposed Township, then such facility need not to be provided.
